title: Henry Mancini - "10" Soundtrack OST vinyl 256kbps
description:
Henry Mancini - "10" Soundtrack

Warner - BSK 3399
1979
1. Don't Call It Love (Main Title) (Instrumental)
2. He Pleases Me (Vocals Julie Andrews)
3. Keyboard Harmony
4. It's Easy To Say (With Chorus)
5. Something For Jenny
6. Don't Call It Love (With Chorus)
7. Get It On (With Chorus)
8. It's Easy To Say (Duet) (Vocals Julie Andrews And Dudley Moore)
9. The Hot Sand Mexican Band
10. I Have An Ear For Love (Vocals The Reverend - Max Showalter)
11. It's Easy To Say (Instrumental) (Piano Solo Dudley Moore)
12. Ravel's Bolero
-
My favourite Henry Mancini album, and a blissful soundtrack to the mid-life-sex-comedy 10, starring Dudley Moore. All of the arrangements here are a delight, from Mancini's piano solos to his funkier "Keyboard Harmony". I personally go for the Mancini efforts with Chorus, in which he outdoes even Ray Conniff. The film has a lush aesthetic, and so does the soundtrack. I hope you enjoy it!
-
Source: Vinyl
Format: 256kbps mp3 (Volume increased by +6dB using MP3Gain)
